mapper.select: SELECT CEIL(NO/5) RNO ,course_begin_time ,course_end_time , NVL(MIN(DECODE(MOD(no,5),1,subject_name)), ' ') mon , NVL(MIN(DECODE(MOD(no,5),2,subject_name)), ' ') thu , NVL(MIN(DECODE(MOD(no,5),3,subject_name)), ' ') wen , NVL(MIN(DECODE(MOD(no,5),4,subject_name)), ' ') thi , NVL(MIN(DECODE(MOD(no,5),0,subject_name)), ' ') fri FROM ( SELECT rownum no ,subject_name,course_begin_time,course_end_time FROM sigan ) GROUP BY CEIL(NO/5),course_begin_time, course_end_time ORDER BY RNO
